meanings.definition: To cut or trim hair as a barber.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the barbered my hair neatly.
meanings.sent2: I always feel refreshed after being barbered at the salon.
meanings.sent3: My dad tried to barbered our dog's fur, but it turned out quite funny.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like it had been barbered by a meticulous landscaper.
meanings.sent5: The sound of scissors barbering through the hair was oddly soothing.

meanings.definition: Having been cut or trimmed by a barber.
meanings.sent1: She admired her barbered hair in the mirror.
meanings.sent2: The barbered edges of his beard gave him a polished look.
meanings.sent3: The barbered lawn outside the shop looked perfectly groomed.
meanings.sent4: The barbered hedges along the path added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The barbered trees lined up neatly along the street.
